item.title: getAllObjects
item.description: SoftLayer_Security_Certificate_Request_ServerType::getAllObjects Returns all SSL certificate server types Overview Returns all SSL certificate server types, which are passed in on a [[SoftLayer_Container_Product_Order_Security_Certificate|certificate order]].
